pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interface to DATASUS System // It allows the user to retrieve the data from the systems of DATASUS (SUS IT department related to the Brazilian Ministry of Health, see http://datasus.saude.gov.br/informacoes-de-saude/tabnet/ for more information) much in the same way that is done in the online portal. For now the package allows access to the SINASC and SIM's (ICD-10) systems, that is, the 'Estatsticas Vitais'.
